backend/main.mo: Defines data models and state for products, updates, contacts, user profiles, logo, and both admin and customer authentication with session management and OTP flows.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features with associated files, components, and test IDs for admin password login, customer OTP login, and routing updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of multiple frontend files, describing UI pages, components, and hooks used across the app.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation describing how to configure a custom domain for the Beemedha Internet Computer deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining typography, themes, color variables, and utility background classes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures hash-based routing and admin-protected routes using AdminRouteGuard, with pages for public and admin sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: React guard component that checks admin session validity and redirects to the login page if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/admin/OwnerOnlyR: Route guard that checks Internet Identity and owner status, showing login or access denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Modal for customer login using email or phone OTP, with request, verification, and logout flows.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with status awareness and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable styled layout primitives including Section, Container, and branded Card, Badge, and Button wrappers.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, quick links, and a newsletter signup form.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with navigation, logo loading, customer login dialog toggling, and admin session controls.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout composing header, footer, main outlet, and global toaster with background pattern.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card displaying a product update summary with type badge, date, title, and preview text.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Price display component showing formatted price, optional original price, and discount badge.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Renders a product card with image, availability badge, description, and price, supporting category fallback images and variant pricing.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Shows a disabled Add to Cart button and alert indicating online checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Provides UI controls to select weight or flavor variants and notifies parent of price changes.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal and a helper to check if a principal matches it.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity and triggers refetch on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin login sessions, validating stored sessions and providing login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerSession.ts: Handles customer sessions with OTP flow, session validation, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, loading/storing identities and providing login and clear actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Returns default polling and refetch settings for live updates.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description when pages load.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports global stylesheet from parent index.css.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with sections describing the brand's story, ethical beekeeping, and purity commitments using images and styled components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminAccessPage: Admin page for adding and removing admin principals using Internet Identity with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Main admin hub showing links to manage products, news, logo, and settings with owner detection.
Login form handling username/password authentication with error display and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Page to view, upload, preview, and update the site logo with file validation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Interface to create and delete product-related news updates, with dialogs and product selection.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Full CRUD interface for products including variants, filtering, search, and stock management.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Displays certification and quality assurance information, including a quality seal, lab testing details, and related visuals.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission handling, plus contact info and feedback alerts.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Defines the homepage with a hero banner, navigation buttons, and trust highlight cards for natural, pure, and labâ€‘tested honey.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and displays details for a specific news update, including date, type badge, message, and related product info with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Displays filterable product updates using tabs, fetching updates by type and showing the latest sorted entries with a last-updated timestamp.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections outlining data collection, usage, sharing, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed product info, variant selection, pricing, availability, and related updates based on the product ID.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists all products with category-based filtering via tabs, showing loading states and timestamps for fetched data.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Displays the site's terms and conditions, covering website use, product information, orders, and other policies.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Encodes only the filename portion of asset paths to ensure special characters render correctly in image URLs.
frontend/src/utils/logo.ts: Converts backend logo byte data into object URLs and provides a helper to revoke them.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Provides helpers for INR price formatting, discount detection, percentage calculation, and display struct construction.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and parses Dfinity principal strings and offers a formatter for truncated display.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project's current state, including admin and customer auth feature requirements and architectural notes.
